All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthService
This service is responsible for sending authentication related requests to Lobby Service.
AuthServiceInterface
Interface for authentication service associated with our game server.
Bank
Bank class.
BroadcastMap
This class is used to manage the broadcast content.
CardJson
For converting json file to level card objects.
Deck
Development deck class.
DeckHash
A deck class made for long polling.
DevelopmentCard
Development card class.
Game
Game class that holds all the information.
GameBank
Game Bank for the whole game.
GameController
Not implemented.
GameParams
This class contains information about session game parameters in Lobby Service.
GameServiceController
This controller is used for Game Service operations related to Lobby Service.
Gem
All six splendor gems.
Greeting
This class contains information about a greeting.
HelloWorldController
This is a sample controller to test the server.
Inventory
Player inventory class.
InventoryController
Inventory controller.
Level
Three levels of level cards.
LevelCard
Card instead of noble.
Noble
Noble class.
NobleJson
For converting json file to noble objects.
NoblesHash
A noble class made for long polling.
Player
Player class.
PlayerBank
Player Bank for each player.
PlayerJson
a player class for long polling.
Price
Price of a development card.
PriceMap
Holds the token price for a development card.
PurchaseMap
Class responsible for representing the gems the player decided to put down to buy a card.
ServerApplication
This class is the entry point of the server.
Session
This class contains information about a session in Lobby Service.
Token
Token class.
TokenPrice
Stores the price of a card that you need to pay with tokens.
TokensInfo
This class contains information about OAuth user tokens.
UrlUtils
Utility class for performing operations on URLs.
User
This class contains information about a user in Lobby Service.
